name: Radioactive Zombies
description:
Radioactive Zombies! is a top-down zombie survival game. You have to protect your base (and yourself!) from relentless zombies. These zombies do tend to explode a lot. However, you can take advantage of that. Killing a zombie next to many others will cause a chain reaction, making them all explode! Don't let the zombies break your base. And remember, you have to take care of yourself as well!

CONTROLS: Movement: WASD Reload: R Switch weapons: Numbers
